function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Companies not implementing or updating policies to follow CDC, OSHA, and local guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within the workplace","Mitigation":"Regular policy updates and adherence to guidelines","Technologies":"Policy management systems","People":"Workers and employees","Owner":"Company management"},{"Description":"Lack of worker training to prevent disease spread in geographic areas","Impact":"Potential increase in disease transmission from workers in different geographic locations","Mitigation":"Comprehensive training and education programs for workers","Technologies":"Online training platforms","People":"Workers and employees","Owner":"Human resources department"},{"Description":"Failure to screen calls for possible exposures and circumstances before worker entry","Impact":"Risk of workers entering environments with potential disease exposure","Mitigation":"Pre-entry screening protocols and assessments","Technologies":"Call screening software","People":"Workers and site supervisors","Owner":"Project management team"}]}
